==Retrieve Functions== 

These commands will querry the OS and return variuos types of information about files and folders (or directories)  The available sub-commands are:

 * [retrieveFolderSize FolderSize]
 * [retrieveFileSize FileSize]
 * [retrieveFile File]
 * [retrieveDir Dir]
 * [retrieveMD5 MD5]
 * [retrieveFileVersion FileVersion]
